code: import{useCallback}from'react';import useBombFinance from'./useBombFinance';import useHandleTransactionReceipt from'./useHandleTransactionReceipt';import{parseUnits}from'ethers/lib/utils';var useWithdraw=function useWithdraw(bank){var bombFinance=useBombFinance();var handleTransactionReceipt=useHandleTransactionReceipt();var handleWithdraw=useCallback(function(amount){var amountBn=parseUnits(amount,bank.depositToken.decimal);handleTransactionReceipt(bombFinance.unstake(bank.contract,bank.poolId,amountBn),"Withdraw ".concat(amount," ").concat(bank.depositTokenName," from ").concat(bank.contract));},[bank,bombFinance,handleTransactionReceipt]);return{onWithdraw:handleWithdraw};};export default useWithdraw;
